query:
SELECT 
  brand,
  COUNT(*) as total_products,
  SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_description,
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as description_rate
FROM products
GROUP BY brand
ORDER BY total_products DESC
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT 
  brand,
  COUNT(*) as total_products,
  SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_description,
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as description_rate
FROM products
GROUP BY brand
ORDER BY total_products DESC
